Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2008 04:39PM becca44 wrote: I want to thank everyone for their prayers and support. Having this site helps. To flyrzfan, I'll be thinking of you, sending positive thoughts your way. My friends and co-workers have been wonderful. I must say reading post from other woman who are going or gone through this has been the best help.
Posts.Title: Mastectomy 4/10/08 becca44 danix5

Posts.Content: becca44 wrote: scared about my upcoming surgery. I have IDC. Actually more scared about what the path report will say. My surgeon said, my path report from the core biopsy wasn't all bad. I just want it to be over with yet scared at the same time.Â  Take care, Becca Dx 3/26/2008, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 2, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
